overview: Frustrated musician Eric tickles the ivories at a local piano bar on a nightly basis. After meeting and becoming instantly smitten with the beautiful Laura, Eric embarks on a journey of erotic self-discovery. However, Eric must ultimately decide between following his heart and realizing his full musical potential or simply spending his life indulging in carnal pleasures.
tagline: There was magic in her fingers... Feel her passion!
title: Classical Romance
